text.section: The Board may use a testing service to administer an examination given under this subtitle.

If the Board uses a testing service, the testing service, subject to the requirements set by the Board, may:
set the time and place of examinations;
give qualified applicants notice of the time and place of examinations; and
furnish any other information that the Board may require the testing service to provide.
An examination shall be given at least once per year in Baltimore City.
